objects.text: Direct-Cool Technology • Energy Efficient • Adjustable Shelves

product_details.name: Whirlpool 184 L 2 Star Direct-Cool Single Door Refrigerator (205 WDE CLS 2S SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z, Blue,2023 Model)
product_details.description: Brand: Whirlpool. Model: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Capacity: 184 litres. Annual Energy Consumption: 190 Kilowatt Hours Per Year. Refrigerator Fresh Food Capacity: 169.2 litres. Freezer Capacity: 14.3 Litres. Bottle Count: 4. Installation Type: Freestanding. Part Number: 205 WDE CLS 2S. Form Factor: Stand Alone. Special Features: Adjustable Shelves. Colour: SAPPHIRE BLUE-Z. Voltage: 220. Wattage: 205 Watts. Number of Drawers: 4. Defrost System: Automatic. Door Orientation: Left. Door Material: Stainless Steel. Shelf Type: Wire. Number of Shelves: 2. Certification: Energy Rating. Material: Stainless Steel. Batteries Required: No. Country of Origin: India. Importer: Whirlpool of India Ltd. Plot No. A-4, MIDC Ranjangaon,Taluka Shirur, Dist: Pune, Maharashtra 412220, India, Email - helpdeskindia@whirlpool.com ; Toll Free - 1800 208 1800. Item Weight: 33 kg 400 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 60.5 x 53.5 x 118.8 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 count. Generic Name: Refrigerator.

banner_details:
The banner features a stylish, tech-focused promotional design for a home appliance product. At the top, a bold, uppercase *heading* text layer announces the product brand and category. Just below, the *subheading* layer describes specific product features such as capacity and color in a clean, modern font. The central area prominently displays the *product_image*, which is visually anchored and set against circular gradient patterns in the background that give a sense of depth. Below the image, the *tagline* emphasizes key selling points like cooling retention and automatic features. Accompanying it is a more detailed *description* layer listing benefits like energy efficiency. Near the bottom, a prominently styled *price* layer uses a vibrant color for emphasis. A rectangular *cta_button* and its overlaid *cta* text invite immediate action with the phrase "BUY NOW".

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Indigo (#1a237e)
- Lavender Blue (#e8eaf6)
- Cool Gray (#c5cae9)
- Vibrant Yellow (#FFD54F)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a refrigerator with a sleek deep blue gradient finish that emphasizes modernity and efficiency. The primary color is a rich royal blue (#0D0F73), transitioning subtly toward a lighter steel blue-gray (#A3A5BC) on the edges, creating a vignette effect that adds depth. White (#FFFFFF) is used prominently for branding and information graphics, creating sharp contrast that draws the viewer's attention. The label also includes accents of red (#C90016), green (#1E5631), and beige (#F2E8CF), contributing to credibility elements. These colors blend harmoniously yet remain well-highlighted, making this palette ideal for an advertisement banner emphasizing trust, technology, and cool elegance.
